code:
flowchart LR
  subgraph Portal[Vue Portal + Nginx Gateway]
    PortalUI[Vue SPA\nPort 8080]
  end

  subgraph Services[Go Microservices]
    UserSvc[User Service\nPort 8081]
    OrderSvc[Order Service\nPort 8082]
    AuditSvc[Audit Log Service\nPort 8083]
  end

  subgraph Datastores[Datastores]
    AppDB[(Shared PostgreSQL\nappdb)]
    Redis[(Redis Cache\nPort 6379)]
  end

  subgraph Observability[Observability]
    Prometheus[Prometheus\nMetrics]
  end

  PortalUI --> UserSvc
  PortalUI --> OrderSvc
  PortalUI --> AuditSvc

  UserSvc --> AppDB
  OrderSvc --> AppDB
  AuditSvc --> AppDB

  UserSvc <--> Redis
  OrderSvc <--> Redis
  AuditSvc <--> Redis

  UserSvc --> Prometheus
  OrderSvc --> Prometheus
  AuditSvc --> Prometheus

  OrderSvc -. service call .-> UserSvc
repo_description: Enterprise-grade sample project for Go microservices, showcasing clean architecture, resilient inter-service communication, PostgreSQL and Redis, JWT-based security, Prometheus observability, automate
